price: Mas arrojamos a verdade contra a falsidade; então, esmaga-a e ei-la nula. E ai de vós pelo que alegais!
arabic: بَلۡ نَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلۡبَٰطِلِ فَيَدۡمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٞۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡوَيۡلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: bal naqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿalā al-bāṭili fayadmaghuhu fa-idhā huwa zāhiqun walakumu al-waylu mimmā taṣifūna
